original_text: Now the people of Beth-shemesh were reaping their wheat harvest in the valley. And when they lifted up their eyes and saw the ark, they rejoiced to see it.
korean_text: 벧세메스 사람들이 골짜기에서 밀을 베다가 눈을 들어 궤를 보고 그 본 것을 기뻐하더니

sentences.original_text: Now the people of Beth-shemesh were reaping their wheat harvest
sentences.korean_translation: 때에 벳세메스 백성들은 밀 추수를 하고 있었으며

sentences.original_text: And when they lifted up their eyes
